instruction: Generate a resume for a given job applicant.
output:
John Smith 
Email: johnsmith@email.com 
Phone: 123-456-7890 
 
Objective 
A hardworking and motivated individual looking for a challenging role in an industry that offers the opportunity to use my skills and expertise to the fullest advantage.
 
Skills
•	Strong organizational and problem solving skills
•	Ability to work well in a fast-paced environment
•	Proficient in MS Office Suite, including Word and Excel
•	Excellent customer service and communication skills 
•	Ability to multitask and prioritize effectively
 
Experience 
Customer Service Representative 
ABC Company, 2019-present
•	Provided technical assistance to customers and resolved their issues expeditiously
•	Ensured customer satisfaction by providing timely service
•	Gathered customer feedback to promote quick resolution of issues 
•	Processed customer orders and ensured accurate data entry

IT Support Technician 
XYZ Company, 2017-2019
•	Troubleshot common IT issues and escalated complex issues as necessary 
•	Conducted routine analyses in order to identify potential errors
•	Advised clients on best practices to mitigate IT risks
•	Assisted in the maintenance and installation of IT systems

Education 
Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology 
XYZ University, 2014-2017

 Certifications 
ITIL Foundation Certificate 
ABC Institute, 2018
